text.autoconfig.asmpshopget.title: ASMP ShopGet (send help)
text.autoconfig.asmpshopget.option.ticks: How often to send all the data collected so far to the server (in Minecraft Ticks 20 Ticks = 1 Second). If you dont send your data before closing Minecraft the data will be lost! Default = 30 Seconds
text.autoconfig.asmpshopget.option.track: Enable waystone tracking. If disabled only shops will be sent (if that isnt disabled too but why have this mod then)
Enable shop tracking. If disabled only waystones will be sent (if that isnt enabled too)
text.autoconfig.asmpshopget.option.enabl: Enables or disables the whole mod.
